    public class dg_CardVisibleAWT
extends dg_Card
    Representation and display routines for cards

    1.06 (2000/02/08)

        int x,
        int y,
        int size,
        Image backImage,
        Dimension imageSize)
        Draw a card with a variable background color
        Parameters:
        g - graphics context
        x - horizontal coordinate of left side of card
        y - vertical coordinate of top of card
        bkgColor - background color of card, if null draw card back

      • drawEmpty

        public static void drawEmpty(Graphics g,
             int x,
             int y,
             Color bkgColor,
             int size)
        Draw card with no symbols or text
        Parameters:
        g - graphics context
        x - horizontal coordinate of left side of card
        y - vertical coordinate of top of card
        bkgColor - color to fill empty card with (if null use card back color)

           int x,

           Color bkgColor,
           int size,
           boolean facedown)
        Draw the top of a card
        Parameters:
        g - graphics context
        x - horizontal coordinate of left side of card
        y - vertical coordinate of top of card
        bkgColor - background color, if null draw face down

      • drawTopChars

        public void drawTopChars(Graphics g,
                int x,
                int y,
                int size,
                boolean selected)
        Print the text and symbol for the top of a card. The color must be set before calling this function.
        Parameters:
        g - graphics context
        x - horizontal coordinate of left side of card
        y - vertical coordinate of top of card
        noAntiAliasing - - use symbols without anti-aliasing

      • drawTopChars

                int x,
                int y,
                int size)

            String name,
            int style,
            int pixHeight)
        Find the largest font whose ascent is less than or equal to pixHeight
        Parameters:
        name - font name
        style - font style
        pixHeight - desired pixel height
